definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="compare_mcblocks"><comment h="53" pinned="false" w="157">Checks for a block at the current variable location.</comment><value name="a"><block inline="false" type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CAULDRON</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CauldronMagicItem</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:MagicCauldron</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
